knora-api:Annotation.rdfs:comment: A generic class for representing annotations
knora-api:Annotation.rdfs:label: Annotation

knora-api:AudioRepresentation.rdfs:comment: Represents a file containing audio data
knora-api:AudioRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Audio)

knora-api:Date.rdfs:comment: Represents a date as a period with different possible precisions.
knora-api:Date.rdfs:label: Date literal

knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:comment: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.
knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:label: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.

knora-api:Geom.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometry specification in JSON.
knora-api:Geom.rdfs:label: Geometry specification

knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:comment: A resource containing moving image data
knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Movie)

knora-api:Region.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometric region of a resource. The geometry is represented currently as JSON string.
knora-api:Region.rdfs:label: Region

knora-api:Representation.rdfs:comment: A resource that can store one or more files
knora-api:Representation.rdfs:label: Representation

knora-api:Resource.rdfs:comment: Represents something in the world, or an abstract thing
knora-api:Resource.rdfs:label: Resource

knora-api:StandoffBooleanTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a boolean in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffColorTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a color in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDataTypeTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a knora-base value type in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDateTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a date in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDecimalTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a decimal (floating point) value in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffIntegerTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an integer value in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffInternalReferenceTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an internal reference in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffIntervalTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an interval in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffLinkTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a reference to a Knora resource in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffUriTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an arbitrary URI in a TextValue

knora-api:StillImageRepresentation.rdfs:comment: A resource that can contain two-dimensional still image files
knora-api:StillImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Image)

knora-api:creationDate.rdfs:comment: Indicates when a resource was created

knora-api:error.rdfs:comment: Provides a message indicating that an operation was unsuccessful
knora-api:error.rdfs:label: error

knora-api:hasAudioFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an audio file
knora-api:hasAudioFile.rdfs:label: has audio file

knora-api:hasColor.rdfs:comment: Specifies the color of a region.
knora-api:hasColor.rdfs:label: Color

knora-api:hasComment.rdfs:comment: Represents a comment on a resource as a knora-base:TextValue
knora-api:hasComment.rdfs:label: Comment

knora-api:hasDocumentFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a document
knora-api:hasDocumentFile.rdfs:label: has document

knora-api:hasFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a file
knora-api:hasFile.rdfs:label: has file

knora-api:hasLinkTo.rdfs:comment: Represents a direct connection between two resources
knora-api:hasLinkTo.rdfs:label: has Link to

knora-api:hasMovingImageFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a movie file
knora-api:hasMovingImageFile.rdfs:label: has movie file

knora-api:hasRepresentation.rdfs:comment: References an instance of a Representation. A Representation contains the metadata of a digital object (= file) which represents some physical entity such as an image, a sound, an encoded text etc.
knora-api:hasRepresentation.rdfs:label: has Representation

knora-api:hasStandoffLinkTo.rdfs:comment: Represents a link in standoff markup from one resource to another.
knora-api:hasStandoffLinkTo.rdfs:label: has Standoff Link to

knora-api:hasStillImageFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an image file
knora-api:hasStillImageFile.rdfs:label: has image file

knora-api:hasTextFile.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a text file
knora-api:hasTextFile.rdfs:label: has text file

knora-api:hasValue.rdfs:comment: The base property of properties that point from Knora resources to Knora values.
knora-api:hasValue.rdfs:label: has value

knora-api:isMainResource.rdfs:comment: Indicates if the given resource is the main resource of a request or a resource referred to by a link property.

knora-api:isPartOf.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this resource is part of another resource
knora-api:isPartOf.rdfs:label: is part of

knora-api:isRegionOf.rdfs:comment: Region of interest within a digital object (e.g. an image)
knora-api:isRegionOf.rdfs:label: is region of

knora-api:objectType.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the objects of a property
knora-api:objectType.rdfs:label: Object type

knora-api:resourceProperty.rdfs:comment: The base property of properties that point from Knora resources to Knora resources or values. These properties are required to have cardinalities in the resource classes in which they are used.
knora-api:resourceProperty.rdfs:label: Resource property

knora-api:result.rdfs:comment: Provides a message indicating that an operation was successful
knora-api:result.rdfs:label: result

knora-api:seqnum.rdfs:comment: Indicates the position of a resource within a sequence
knora-api:seqnum.rdfs:label: Sequence number

knora-api:subjectType.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the subjects of a property
knora-api:subjectType.rdfs:label: Subject type

knora-api:hasOntologies.rdfs:label: The knora-api ontology in the simple schema
